articles.title: GREG GUTFELD: Biden was elected four years ago and we're still battling for the soul of America - Fox News
articles.description: Fox News host Greg Gutfeld unpacks President Joe Biden's 2024 re-election campaign video and looks back at some of his campaign promises from four years ago on 'Gutfeld!'

articles.title: Biden, 80, makes 2024 presidential run official as Trump fight looms - Reuters
articles.description: President Joe Biden launched his re-election bid on Tuesday with a promise to protect American liberties from "extremists" linked to former President Donald Trump, who he beat in 2020 and might face again in 2024.
